extendedInfo.description: Now your favorite game is available on your mobile device! Bones is a new application that allows users to enjoy playing the classic game of dominoes everywhere you go!With this application, users can challenge friends, network opponents, or use the practice feature in order to sharpen their skills and strategies.Plus, the chat feature allows users to message opponents and engage in competitive and friendly dialogue.Bones offers exciting new features such as:-Multiplayer capabilities-Interactive chat feature-Play up to 10 different games at once-Drag and drop pieces- Immediate notifications on the latest play and recent chat messageGet playing and download Bones today!

reviews.title: Bones free
reviews.comment: It keeps freezing on me...and my galaxy s3...I like it but its getting frustrating.
reviews.author: Mrz Lopez

reviews.title: Very hard to play due to app bugs...
reviews.comment: Of all of the dominoes games I\'ve tried so far this is the best and the worst at the same time. I\'m easily able to start a game with my brother, and I like that we can play with no timer so we can have a casual game, but it unreliably updates when he makes a move and constantly force closes. I have to log out of the game and then log back in to get it to update (which I do after it has crashed on me). We both have phones that are plenty capable. I\'m using a Nexus 4 and he\'s on the Galaxy S3. Plz fix this!
reviews.author: Faux Pas

reviews.title: Good GAme
reviews.comment: While playing Robert,Brian,and Kiesha they do not pull they pass but on my turn I have to pull when I can\'t play please fix other than that nice game
